localised_button_description.last_approved_text: All items crafted will be added to your Magical Items pool; a character can be equipped with items from their Character Details panel.

localised_button_description.last_approved_text: Legions of Legend: Once awoken, these elite units will be available for recruitment from the Regiments of Renown panel. \n\n A New Dynasty: Expands the number of armies you can field by making new Lords available for recruitment.
